name: Dish Dasher
description:
Dish Dasher was created in a week-long game jam with the one rule being it must be satisfying.

Game Instructions - 
To play the game move the mouse left and right to catch the plates once the plates are thrown in the air right click on the mouse to swing the bat.

Pick up powerups by moving the character over them.

CREDITS

Producer -  Amelia Lazouras.

Programmers - https://oliver-smith.itch.io/, Drew Tavares.

Artist - Kai Ahmed, Samuele Amaddio, Archie Bigsby-Thompson, Amelia Lazouras.

Sound - Rhys Rose, Amra El-Mahdey.

Design - Sergiu Popescu, Andreas Petrou.
